name: feed_pet
attributes: # [doc = " フードを消費してペットの体力を回復するが、"]
# [doc = " pet_account.owner と ctx.accounts.user.key() の一致を検証していない"]
body: let pet = & mut ctx . accounts . pet_account ;
let heal_amount = (food_amount as u64) . checked_mul (ctx . accounts . config . health_per_food) . unwrap () ;
pet . health = pet . health . checked_add (heal_amount) . unwrap () ;
pet . food_consumed = pet . food_consumed . checked_add (food_amount as u64) . unwrap () ;

fields.name: pet_account
fields.attribute: # [account (mut)] # [doc = " 本来は #[account(has_one = owner)] を指定して照合すべき"]

fields.name: user
fields.attribute: # [doc = " フードを使うユーザー（署名者）"]

fields.name: config
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 回復量設定を保持するアカウント"]

fields.name: owner
fields.attribute: # [doc = " このペットを所有するユーザーの Pubkey"]

fields.name: food_consumed
fields.attribute: # [doc = " これまでに消費したフードの総数"]

fields.name: health_per_food
fields.attribute: # [doc = " フード1個あたりの回復量"]
